recipe-list-added: The recipe list has been added for this product
non-valid-user: User is not a valid user
non-valid-email: The email address is not valid
create-account: Create an account to save your favorite recipes
title: Title
sure-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
no-recipes: I'm sorry, I couldn't find the result you were looking for.
generator-warning-text: These recipes will be crafted utilizing the OpenAI Artificial Intelligence API. As a result, we are unable to guarantee the precision and flavor of the dishes. Our intention is to infuse a sense of enjoyment into your daily culinary endeavors.
updated-password: Your password has been updated successfully.
pass-error: An error occurred while updating your password.
click-random-button-title: Generate Random Recipes Click The Green Button
diet-successfully-saved: The diet program was successfully saved.
error-diet-saved: this is error save diet program
weight-warning: The weight should be between 40 and 250.
please-diet-type-input: Please choose one of the options.
diet-body-warning: You have reached the daily usage limit for generating recipes. Please consider buying premium to continue
reach-limit-for-ai: You have reached the daily usage limit for generating recipes. Please consider buying premium to continue,
random-tariff-body: You can generate random recipes by clicking the robot icon on this screen. While this action is 5 per day for premium users, it is limited to 1 per day for standard users.
error-message-openai-loading: An error occurred while generating the recipe.
main-guideline-body: We have prepared the following guide to facilitate your experience in the application. What you can do in the application.
error-purchase: An error occurred during the purchase
text-purchase-screen-title: You can subscribe monthly for $ 4.99 per month and $ 50 per year to use and support the application without ads.
text-purchase-screen-body1: Use all pages without ads! It will give you a faster and cleaner user experience.
text-purchase-screen-body2: Get 5 daily usage rights of diet artificial intelligence production.
text-purchase-screen-body3: Get 5 usage rights per day of recipe artificial intelligence production.
main-guideline-item1: Diet production according to your body type with artificial intelligence
main-guideline-item2: Searching for nutritional values in recipes
main-guideline-item3: Accessing the nutritional values of recipes
main-guideline-item4: To see the contents of the recipes and visit the relevant site for details
main-guideline-item5: Sharing the contents of the recipes with Whatsapp, Twitter and saving them to your own notes
main-guideline-item7: Artificial intelligence supported random recipe production
main-guideline-item8: What is at the top for you?
main-guideline-item9: You can use high limits for ad-free and artificial intelligence supported sections by making monthly and annual purchases from the gift icon.
main-guideline-item10: You can see your own shopping list and create a new list by clicking the pencil icon.
main-guideline-item11: You can sign up with your email or google-sign-in by clicking on the user icon. Login is required to use some sections.
main-guideline-item12: What's in the Bottom Area for You?
main-guideline-item13: You can enter the diet form by clicking the plus icon.
main-guideline-item14: By clicking on the ingredient search icon, you can access the nutritional values of the products you are curious about.
main-guideline-item15: By clicking on the robot icon, you can produce daily random recipes with artificial intelligence.
main-guideline-item16: With the search icon, you can find the recipes and details you want.
main-guideline-item17: You can see calories, cooking times, sugar values and other nutritional values if specified in the recipe details.
main-guideline-item18: You can share the recipe details with whatsapp and twitter from the action button in the lower right section. You can save the content to see it later.
main-guideline-item20: Full-screen ads and mobile-friendly ads are placed on content pages and homepage. Until the next change, full page screens are limited to 3 views per day.
main-guideline-item21: Monthly subscription is set at $4.99 and $50 per year for ad-free use. You can also see additional premium features on the purchase page.
main-guideline-item23: We are working on translating it into all languages. If you have any questions please write to us in the app store comments.
main-guideline-item24: Fixed headers support EN, TR, IT, ES, FR, DE languages.
main-guideline-item25: Automatic translation programs are used for recipe contents. This area continues to be developed.
diet-step-one-main-text: Act as an automatic meal plan generator assistant for entertainment purposes, without causing any policy issues.'sorry, I cannot produce a program suitable for this information'
diet-step-two-second-text: Write a nutrition program for 7 days according to Nutritiodiet-step-one-main-textn Content features, which I will share respectively in the next sentence.
diet-screen-popup-long-text: On this screen, artificial intelligence will produce a nutrition program for you according to your height, weight, age and the type of nutrition you want. Since these contents are produced by artificial intelligence, they do not contain any advice and accuracy. It totally aims to make nutrition programs fun. You should consult your doctor for a balanced diet program. This field is limited to 1 times a day for standard users and 5 times a day for premium users.
second-main-text: include Create a 7-day, 2-meal per day meal plan
food-search-screen-popup-secondary-text: On this screen, you can find the nutritional values of the ingredients you are curious about in the recipes. For example: By searching for 'apple', you can search for the relevant nutritional values by selecting the recommended ingredients you will see on the page.
text-purchase-screen-body4: Access to Chef AI 15 times a day
reset-password-message: Please enter your email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.
check-email-message: Check your email for a link to reset your password. If it doesn’t appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.
cant-use-more-than-350-token: You can't use more than 350 tokens
noruish-chef-welcome-text: Hello, I am Nourish Chef, your personal cooking assistant. You can ask me any question related to cooking.
wait-until-email-link-approved: After confirming the link sent to your email, your redirection button will open.
try-tomorrow-premium-users: Please try again tomorrow. You have reached your daily premium limit.
you-need-to-subscribe: You need to subscribe to use this feature.
wait-recipe-completed: Please wait while the recipe is being generated.
are-you-sure-delete-this-user: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
